caption.p: ZIKV infection kinetics in immunocompetent mice. C57BL/6J mice were infected intravenously with 10 7 PFU of ZIKV-PR or vehicle and euthanized at 1 dpi ( n = 4), 2 dpi ( n = 4), 4 dpi ( n = 4), 6 dpi ( n = 4), and 8 dpi ( n = 4). ZIKV RNA quantification was assessed in plasma (in red; expressed as RNA copies/mL of blood), spleen (in blue; expressed as RNA copies/10 6 cells) and brain homogenates (in black; expressed as RNA copies/10 6 cells) by qPCR. Data are mean Â± SEM.
